coffee beans.description: delicious coffee beans with hints of citrus and chocolate. medium roast.

candle.description: hand-poured soy candle. autumn leaves scent will fill your home.

firewood.description: high-quality beech wood. suitable for home burning.

vegan caramels.description: 1 dozen pumpkin spice caramels. you won't believe they're vegan.

pumpkin spice.description: pumpkin spice blend. 2oz (57 grams). try it in pie, coffee, oatmeal, and pancakes!

ceramic mug.description: high-quality themed mug. 15oz. orange ceramic. dishwasher- and microwave-safe.

rain boots.description: these rubber rain boots are ready for anything. men's sizes.

mittens.description: never have cold fingers with these handmade white mittens.
